title: Wrong username and password
body:
I was in a game, then I got kicked out of the game when I try to log back in league is saying my username or password is incorrect..... and it isnt.... I even changed my password and still
(So the game ended and I was able to log back in so idk if that's how ddos works but yeah.. oh and I got leaver, thanks riot <3)

replies.body: Really riot?????? Ok I knoW FOR A FACT THIS DAMN ISSUE OF THE WRONG USERNAME OR PASSWORD WAS RIOTS FAULT, AND I GET LEAVER ??!?!?!?!??!?!! Like WHAT?! This is not fair maannnn like I have a (insert f word here) job I can't sit around waiting for 20 minute queues like cmon now hollyyy, oh and also it's bs about if you don't leave games for a while you're timer drops in the last 4 months I got 3 messages telling me that I haven't left games in a while so my leaver status whatever been updated and I see that's a (insert f word here) LIE riot needs to fix their s*** man

yea I just got completely dc'd from the game with 120 fps and 53 ms. then I couldn't log in with my user name and pass so I reinstalled the game. now my client wont even down files and I get a error 004 which no one seems to know how to fix. -.- prlly gonna have leaverbuster if I do get the game back running again too -.-*
Dude I feel you.... I d/c with 31 ms and 100 fps crap is dumb man then we pay the price by doing leaver busters

It sucks that happened to you, but it's unlikely that this was a ddos.  Your network might be having an with the authentication server, but simplying restarting the client should fix that.  [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) prioritizes games played more than elapsed time.  So if you are are away while having a poor standing with Leaverbuster, then it's possible to get another if you return a few months later as an example.  Let me know if that clears things up, if you run into any issues.
lol that's bs... there's nothing wrong with my internet and 3 other people had the same problem they all have network connection problems?? Smh I'm done talking to the riot team tbh never helps
